name: Animals Party Blitz: Match to Crush
name_original: Animals Party Blitz: Match to Crush
description:
Switch and match your way through unlimited levels in this addictive puzzle adventure.


The super hit game Animals Party Blitz is now available for iPhone and iPod Touch!
-------------------------------

Animals Party Blitz features:
● Excellent graphics that will leave you hungry for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● unlimited t levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Items to unlock by completing levels
● Power up to help with those challenging levels
-------------------------------
